title: Taskmaster host Greg Davies' face recreated using random objects - with hilarious results
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

These are the freaky finalists in The Mirror's Taskmaster challenge to recreate Greg Davies' face out of household objects.

We had more than 100 entries for the competition to win a 49-inch LED TV and a giant throne just like Greg sits in on the popular Dave show.

Resourceful readers used all sorts of items to nail Greg’s famous face from pegs and eggs to beer bottles and books.

And now our panel of judges have whittled down the wonderful works to a shortlist of five based on their likeness to the funnyman and degree of creativity.

It's now over to our army of readers to vote for the overall winner in the poll below.

We launched our creative competition to celebrate the brilliant new series nine of Taskmaster - the next episode of which airs tonight on Dave at 9pm.

The wacky show sees joker Greg setting strange challenges for a line-up of comedian contestants, with his latest batch of ‘victims’ being David Baddiel, Jo Brand, Ed Gamble, Katy Wix and Rose Matafeo.

Online voting closes at 23:59 Sunday 27 October.

Entry 1 - By Rick Kershaw

Entry 2 - By Ben Stoney

Entry 3 - By Georgina Good

Entry 4 - By Phoebe Buxton

Entry 5 - William Pool

Now vote for your winner...

poll loading Vote for the winner of our Taskmaster challenge 0+ VOTES SO FAR Entry 1 Entry 2 Entry 3 Entry 4 Entry 5
description: It's time to vote for your favourite who will bag an LED TV and their very own throne!
